content:
As I shared on the co-chairs list a few days ago, there's a lot of outstanding change requests that need to be applied. Deadline for R4B is just past the end of Feb. Deadline for all normative content in R5 is end of March. That's 2 weeks and ~ 6 weeks respectively. And July for all R5 changes will come sooner than we'd all like. So hopefully all work groups are prioritizing getting their particular work group's changes made in a timely fashion. If any of you have some extra cycles, FHIR-I is facing a backlog of over 700 unapplied changes. Details on how to help out are here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179280-fhir.2Finfrastructure-wg/topic/Volunteers.20needed

If you need help or guidance yourselves, please PM me or raise on the #committers stream.
